pages.text: $(#0BE334)Item Added In Simply More$(br2)$()A prototype for the mechanical marvel which would have been used by a Steampunk society's greatest warriors and protectors. A weapon designed to be effective even in the hands of someone with no experience, and to flourish in the hands of someone skilled

with such weaponry. The weapon adapts to the user’s movements to enhance and take over their strikes, slicing many times per second with little effort from the user. As a prototype, it oxidises when overused, a quirk that had to be ironed out. What a shame it was that they didn’t figure it out in time.
